page.title: Merck Profit Falls, Hurt by Vioxx Recall
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Merck Co. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MRK.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MRK.N</A> on Thursday said its quarterly profit fell 28 percent due to last month's recall of its Vioxx arthritis drug, and the company predicted 2004 earnings will fall as much as 11 percent because of the recall.
